name: Admin-Colour
author: Alex Wells

sections.description: This plugin is for colour coding the admin menu. Users are able to define the colours they want in the plugins settings. I created the plugin to make it easier to switch between sections of the admin area when updating my wordpress websites. This plugin was created by Alex Wells while working as a Web Developer at Simpsons Creative
sections.installation:
1. Upload folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Who Created the plugin =

This plugin has been created by Alex Wells, a Web Developer working at Simpsons Creative
